LoginForm.carddescription: Enter your email below to login to your account

Tutorial.desc1: Take care of your well-being across 6 dimensions. Challenge yourself with daily tasks, keep a journal, and let WellSphere help you track your progress!
Tutorial.desc2: Stay active! Set physical goals, like running or exercising, to keep your body healthy.
Tutorial.desc3: Balance your emotions. Set a goal to talk about your feelings and reflect daily.
Tutorial.desc4: Challenge your mind! Set a goal, like reading a book or learning something new.
Tutorial.desc5: Build better connections! Set goals to improve your relationships each day.
Tutorial.desc6: Find inner peace. Add a meditation practice to your daily routine.
Tutorial.desc7: Stay ahead in your career! Set goals to keep up with market trends and improve professionally.
Tutorial.title: Default Title
Tutorial.text: This is a default step description

WelcomePage.paragraph: Discover amazing features and boost your productivity with our innovative application.
